body.p:
To His Excellency Thos E Bramlette
Govr State of Kentucky

We the undersigned citizens of Warren County and living in the neighborhood of William Stagner, who was at the February Term of the Warren Circuit Court, sent to the penitentiary for receiving Stolen property - having learned that a petition has been sent to your excellency requesting a pardon of the said Stagner - take this prudent of entering our protest against your exercise of any clemency in his behalf - for his character in the neighborhood is very bad - and we think he justly deserves the punishment awarded to him and hope for the sake of good morals, law - and the neighbors that he will be required to serve his full Term in the state prison

John M Stone
F B Jones

I certify that I know the men who have signed this paper opposite to this & say they are reliable.
J C Wilkins
BGreen Ky
John Grubb
Benj Runner
John J Jones
John.A. Stagner
W..m.. Edmondson
Wm Ellis
B. J. Ellis
(over)
We the undersigned fully endorse the within Petitiion.

W. S. Raland
Jno Loving
C
